enWisdom: Self-sacrifice is a virtue, hoarding [wealth] is a vice
Self-sacrifice is the noblest benevolence
Self-sacrifice is a trait of the virtuous
Self-sacrifice is the highest degree of benevolence
Self-sacrifice is the noblest munificence
Self-sacrifice is the highest form of benevolence
Self-sacrifice is the loftiest of noble traits

Wisdom: الْإِيثَارُ عَلَى مَرَاتِبِ الْكَرَمِ وَأَفْضَلُ الشِّيَمِ
enWisdom: Self-sacrifice is the highest level of munificence and the most excellent quality
Self-sacrifice is the greatest worship and the most sublime eminence

Wisdom: الْإِيثَارُ أَحْسَنُ الْإِحْسَانِ وَأَعْلَى مَرَاتِبِ الْإِيمَانِ
enWisdom: Self-sacrifice is the best [form of] benevolence and the highest stage of faith
Self-sacrifice is a trait of the virtuous and a quality of the righteous
The most excellent generosity is self-sacrifice
The best munificence is altruism
The highest level of munificence is self-sacrifice
It is through self-sacrifice that the free become enslaved
It is through self-sacrifice that munificence gets true meaning
By preferring others over yourself, you gain [their] servitude

Wisdom: عِنْدَ الْإِيثَارِ عَلَى النَّفْسِ تَتَبَيَّنُ جَوَاهِرُ الْكُرَمَاءِ
enWisdom: In times of [their] altruism, the excellence of the noble-minded people become manifest
The pinnacle of noble traits is altruism
Self-sacrifice suffices as nobility

Wisdom: مَنْ آثَرَ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ بَالَغَ فِي الْمُرُوَّةِ
enWisdom: Whoever prefers others to himself has reached the height of magnanimity

Wisdom: مَنْ آثَرَ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ اسْتَحَقَّ اسْمَ الْفَضِيلَةِ
enWisdom: Whoever prefers others to himself deserves to be called a person of virtue

Wisdom: مِنْ شِيَمِ الْأَبْرَارِ حَمْلُ النُّفُوسِ عَلَى الْإِيثَارِ
enWisdom: Urging the self towards altruism is from the qualities of the righteous
One of best [form of] benevolence is self-sacrifice
From the best of choices is adorning oneself with selflessness
